episodes.title: My family's cult dynamics and my yearning to self destruct
episodes.description:
The functioning of cults is very similar to the functioning of abusive families. The purpose of a cult is to empower the leader by sucking the power from the members. In this video, I discuss how these dynamics worked in my family, leading to my programming of self destruction.

#toxic people #abuse #trauma #PTSD #narcissitic people #mental health #recoveryjourney #trust #personaltestimony #dissociativeidentitydisorder #evil #narcissist

episodes.title: Family systems as cults
episodes.description:
Today I introduce the topic of how the functioning of cults is very similar to the functioning of abusive families. The purpose of a cult is to empower the leader by sucking the power from the members. This will be a topic I explore from the perspective of trauma healing, and I will be delving into the experiences of how cult survivors have deprogrammed themselves.


#toxic people #abuse #trauma #PTSD #narcissitic people #mental health #recoveryjourney #trust #personaltestimony #dissociativeidentitydisorder #evil #narcissist
